item.title: Synergy - Joinus Today!
item.dc:creator: @dogs dogs
item.description:
@dogs wrote:

[CENTER]Synergy is an Eco/PvP Based server, with all the skills works, friendly community, active owners, and much more!

NOTE: You need the latest Java to open the client.jar!
Here’s the link: Download Java for Windows
You will need your Java platform to be at 1.7 or higher(recommended).

Links

Webclient:
Synergy - Webclient

Our Website:
Synergy

Client download:
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/49052085/Client.jar

The Owners are Google, and Blake.

We have 2 Donator ranks:

  1. Regular Donator;
    Benefits: Donator Only Monsters, Donator Only Shops, Donator Zone, Ability To Yell, and much more!

  2. Trusted Dicer;
    Benefits; Same as Donator, Custom Yell [Trusted Dicer], Ability To Dice In-game!

Our Working Skills:
Woodcutting;
Mining;
Smithing;
Farming;
Firemaking;
Herblore;
Fishing;
Agility;
Prayer;
Runecrafting;
Thieving;
Slayer;
Cooking;
Fletching;
Hunter.

Our Minigames:
Barrows;
Pest Control;
Tzhaar Cave;
Duel Arena;
Warrior Guild;

Miscellaneous:
Loads of Monsters/Bosses;
Donator Only Benefits / Monsters;
Commands for Regular / Donators;
Faster Switching;
Faster Eating;
Fully Working Turmoil;
Custom Dicer Rank!;
and Much more Come check us out!
